'''The Stranding of the Beagle''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find all five [[Researcher's Notes]] on Watatsumi Island.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to a 1839 book {{w|The Voyage of the Beagle}} written by Charles Darwin.
